anya-e0105n4:1_0: 4. Punapi so evamāha “kiñcāpi buddhaghoso rāmāyaṇamahābhāratasaṅkhātānaṁ mahākabbasatthānaṁ
anya-e0105n4:1_1: sukusalo viya na dissati, tathāpi tāni dassesi. Kathaṁ? Akkhānanti bhāratayujjhanādikaṁ,
anya-e0105n4:1_2: taṁ yasmiṁ ṭhāne kathīyati, tattha gantumpi na vaṭṭatīti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.13 ca,
anya-e0105n4:1_4: tathārūpikathākathanañcāti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.8 ca dassesī”ti.
anya-e0105n4:2_0: Taṁ pana purimavacanatopi ahetukataraṁ kevalaṁ anādarīkaraṇamattameva. Atigambhīratthassa
anya-e0105n4:2_1: hi atigarukaraṇīyassa piṭakattayassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ niratthakassa samphapalāpasamudāyabhūtassa
anya-e0105n4:2_2: kabbasatthassa vitthārato pakāsanena kiṁ siyā payojanaṁ, aññadatthu sāyevassa asammānitā,
